meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ben Zimmer Melinda Dudley Jill Rowley Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6871.

td.p: Ben Zimmer, a linguist and language columnist from Jersey City, New Jersey
Melinda Dudley, a recent law school graduate from Hayden, Colorado
Jill Rowley, a flight attendant from Baltimore, Maryland (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,201)

tr.td: MAN OVERLORD!
3-LETTER WORDS
TV HOSTS
REMEMBER THE ALIMONY
POTENT POTABLES
A MODEL OF FORD, &...
